name: Let The Goat Dance
description:
One Goat, One Goal
Let The Goat Dance!

In this reflex based action game, the player must protect the Dancing Goat from objects being thrown from off-screen, while keeping the music going on with the DJ Table.

Rotate your shield to block the red negative items and let the green positive one's touch the goat to earn bonuses, such as health and score.

From time to time the DJ Board will activate. Push the buttons that Light up and Hold the DJ Disco to enter Fever Mode. Careful, though, If you miss it you will be punished!

How to Play:

"A" and "D" to rotate the barrier around the Goat.
Left Mouse Click to interact with the DJ board mini games
